refnamediv.refpurpose: Return a list of successfully loaded additional Lua C libraries

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public arrayLuaSandbox::additionalLibraries
Returns a list of successfully loaded additional Lua C libraries as a numbered array.
For more information about loading additional libraries, see luasandbox.additional_libraries.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns a numbered array of Lua additional libraries' global names, which may be empty.
